verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa yā qaumi lā yajrimannakum syiqāqī ay yuṣībakum miṡlu mā aṣāba qauma nūḥin au qauma hūdin au qauma ṣāliḥ(in), wa mā qaumu lūṭim minkum biba'īd(in).
verses.translation: О мой народ! Пусть разногласия со мной Не навлекут на вас греха, За что постигнет вас подобное тому, Что испытали люди Нуха, Салиха иль Худа; Недалеко от вас и люди Лута

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّى رَحِيمٌ وَدُودٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَغْفِرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> رَبَّكُمْ ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ تُوب<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِلَيْهِ‌ۚ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ رَبِّى رَحِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6468'>مٌ و</tajweed>َد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wastagfirū rabbakum ṡumma tūbū ilaih(i), inna rabbī raḥīmuw wadūd(un).
verses.translation: Просите же прощения у вашего Владыки, Потом к Нему (в раскаянии) обращайтесь! Поистине, Господь мой милосерд, Любви (к творениям Своим) исполнен

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰشُعَيْبُ مَا نَفْقَهُ كَثِيرًا مِّمَّا تَقُولُ وَإِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِينَا ضَعِيفًا ۖ وَلَوْلَا رَهْطُكَ لَرَجَمْنَـٰكَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْنَا بِعَزِيزٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>شُعَيْبُ مَا نَفْقَهُ كَثِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3437'>رًا م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا تَقُولُ وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَنَرَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٮٰ</tajweed>كَ فِينَا ضَعِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6469'>فًا‌ۖ و</tajweed>َلَوْلَا رَهْطُكَ لَرَجَمْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كَ‌ۖ وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':169'>نت</tajweed>َ عَلَيْنَا بِعَز<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>زٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū yā syu'aibu mā nafqahu kaṡīram mimmā taqūlu wa innā lanarāka fīnā ḍa'īfā(n), wa lau lā rahṭuka larajamnāk(a), wa anta 'alainā bi'azīz(in).
verses.translation: Они сказали: "О Шу'айб! Нам много из того, что говоришь ты, непонятно, И видим мы, что ты меж нами слаб. И если б не был род твой (знатен), Мы забросали бы тебя камнями, - Ведь ты для нас совсем не дорог

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَرَهْطِىٓ أَعَزُّ عَلَيْكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُ وَرَآءَكُمْ ظِهْرِيًّا ۖ إِنَّ رَبِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ مُحِيطٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>قَوْمِ أَرَهْط<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَعَزُّ عَلَيْك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':1301'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':321'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6470'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّخَذْتُمُوهُ وَر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَكُمْ ظِهْرِيًّا‌ۖ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ رَبِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ مُح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ط</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla yā qaumi arahṭī a'azzu 'alaikum minallāh(i), wattakhażtumūhu warā'akum ẓihriyyā(n), inna rabbī bimā ta'malūna muḥīṭ(un).
verses.translation: Он (им) сказал: "О мой народ! Ужель мой род дороже вам Аллаха, Что вы (небрежно) за спиной оставили Его? Но, истинно, Господь мой (веденьем Своим) Объемлет все, что вы творите

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنِّى عَـٰمِلٌ ۖ سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ مَن يَأْتِيهِ عَذَابٌ يُخْزِيهِ وَمَنْ هُوَ كَـٰذِبٌ ۖ وَٱرْتَقِبُوٓا۟ إِنِّى مَعَكُمْ رَقِيبٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَيَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>قَوْمِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6471'>ٱ</tajweed>عْمَلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى عَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6472'>لٌ‌ۖ س</tajweed>َوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6325'>َن ي</tajweed>َأْتِيهِ عَذَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6326'>بٌ ي</tajweed>ُخْزِيهِ وَمَنْ هُوَ كَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6473'>بٌ‌ۖ و</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6474'>ٱ</tajweed>رْتَقِب<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى مَعَكُمْ رَق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa yā qaumi'malū 'alā makānatikum innī 'āmil(un), saufa ta'lamūn(a), may ya'tīhi 'ażābuy yukhzīhi wa man huwa kāżib(un), wartaqibū innī ma'akum raqīb(un).
verses.translation: О мой народ! Творите все, что в ваших силах, А я свое (намерен) делать, И скоро вы узнаете, кто тот, Кого постигнет наказание позором И кто окажется лжецом. Вы ждите - с вами подожду и я

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا نَجَّيْنَا شُعَيْبًا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحْمَةٍ مِّنَّا وَأَخَذَتِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ فِى دِيَـٰرِهِمْ جَـٰثِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ أَمْرُنَا نَجَّيْنَا شُعَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6475'>بًا و</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':37'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مَعَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> بِرَحْمَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4803'>ةٍ م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا وَأَخَذَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6476'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6412'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّيْحَةُ فَأَصْبَحُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فِى دِيَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رِهِمْ جَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ثِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lammā jā'a amrunā najjainā syu'aibaw wal-lażīna amanū ma'ahū biraḥmatim minnā, wa akhażatil-lażīna ẓalamuṣ-ṣaiḥatu fa aṣbaḥū fī diyārihim jāṡimīn(a).
verses.translation: Когда же Наше повеленье проявилось, Спасли Шу'айба Мы и тех, Кто с ним уверовал (в Аллаха), По милости от Нас. А тех, что были нечестивы, Зловещий вопль поразил, И уж наутро в собственных домах Они поверженными ниц лежали

verses.text_uthmani: كَأَن لَّمْ يَغْنَوْا۟ فِيهَآ ۗ أَلَا بُعْدًا لِّمَدْيَنَ كَمَا بَعِدَتْ ثَمُودُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَأ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':2914'>َن ل</tajweed>َّمْ يَغْنَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فِيه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ‌ۗ</tajweed> أَلَا بُعْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6477'>دًا ل</tajweed>ِّمَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6478'>دْ</tajweed>يَنَ كَمَا بَعِدَتْ ثَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ka allam yagnau fīhā, alā bu'dal limadyana kamā ba'idat ṡamūd(u).
verses.translation: Как будто никогда не жили там. О да! Пусть сгинут мадйаниты! Как прежде сгинули и самудяне, (Господним гневом сражены)

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔـايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِنَا وَسُلْطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6479'>نٍ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad arsalnā mūsā bi'āyātinā wa sulṭānim mubīn(in).
verses.translation: И Мы послали Мусу с Нашими знаменьями и ясной властью

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَ فِرْعَوْنَ ۖ وَمَآ أَمْرُ فِرْعَوْنَ بِرَشِيدٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>يْ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6480'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّبَع<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَمْرَ فِرْعَوْنَ‌ۖ وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَمْرُ فِرْعَوْنَ بِرَش<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ilā fir'auna wa mala'ihī fattaba'ū amra fir'aun(a), wa mā amru fir'auna birasyīd(in).
verses.translation: К Фараону и его вельможам; Они ж пошли за повеленьем Фараона. Но повеление его было неправым (руководством)

verses.text_uthmani: يَقْدُمُ قَوْمَهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فَأَوْرَدَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْوِرْدُ ٱلْمَوْرُودُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6481'>قْ</tajweed>دُمُ قَوْمَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> يَوْمَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':592'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقِيَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مَةِ فَأَوْرَدَهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6482'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َارَ‌ۖ وَبِئْسَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6483'>ٱ</tajweed>لْوِرْدُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6484'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَوْر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yaqdumu qaumahū yaumal-qiyāmati fa auradahumun-nār(a), wa bi'sal-wirdul-maurūd(u).
verses.translation: Он будет шествовать перед своим народом В День Воскресения (на Суд) И отведет его на водопой (Во чрево) огненного (Ада), - Как скверен будет водопой, К которому (он их) доставит

verses.text_uthmani: وَأُتْبِعُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِۦ لَعْنَةً وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ بِئْسَ ٱلرِّفْدُ ٱلْمَرْفُودُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأُتْبِعُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فِى هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> لَعْنَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6394'>ةً و</tajweed>َيَوْمَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':443'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقِيَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مَةِ‌ۚ بِئْسَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6485'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رِّفْدُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6486'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَرْف<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa utbi'ū fī hāżihī la'nataw wa yaumal-qiyāmah(ti), bi'sar-rifdul-marfūd(u).
verses.translation: И их преследует проклятие и здесь, И в День (их) Воскресения (на Суд). И скверен будет дар, Что будет (им) доставлен

verses.text_uthmani: ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلْقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّهُۥ عَلَيْكَ ۖ مِنْهَا قَآئِمٌ وَحَصِيدٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ مِنْ أَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':1910'>نۢب</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6487'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> عَلَيْكَ‌ۖ مِنْهَا ق<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6488'>مٌ و</tajweed>َحَص<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Żālika min ambā'il-qurā naquṣṣuhū 'alaika minhā qā'imuw wa ḥaṣīd(un).
verses.translation: Это - лишь несколько из сказов о селениях (общин), Которые тебе Мы повествуем. Одни из них теперь еще стоят, Другие же уже пожаты

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا ظَلَمْنَـٰهُمْ وَلَـٰكِن ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ ۖ فَمَآ أَغْنَتْ عَنْهُمْ ءَالِهَتُهُمُ ٱلَّتِى يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن شَىْءٍ لَّمَّا جَآءَ أَمْرُ رَبِّكَ ۖ وَمَا زَادُوهُمْ غَيْرَ تَتْبِيبٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا ظَلَمْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمْ وَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6489'>ن ظ</tajweed>َلَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':38'>نف</tajweed>ُسَهُمْ‌ۖ فَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَغْنَتْ عَنْهُمْ ءَالِهَتُهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6490'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّتِى يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':1240'>دْ</tajweed>عُونَ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':107'>ن د</tajweed>ُونِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':108'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2103'>ن ش</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6491'>َىْءٍ ل</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ أَمْرُ رَبِّكَ‌ۖ وَمَا زَادُوهُمْ غَيْرَ تَتْب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>ٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā ẓalamnāhum wa lākin ẓalamū anfusahum famā agnat 'anhum ālihatuhumul-latī yad'ūna min dūnillāhi min syai'il lammā jā'a amru rabbik(a), wa mā zādūhum gaira tatbīb(in).
verses.translation: Не Мы им причинили зло, А они сами зло себе снискали, И божества, которые они, опричь Аллаха, призывали, Ни от чего их не спасли, Когда явилось повеленье твоего Владыки, А лишь усилили их гибель

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَخْذُ رَبِّكَ إِذَآ أَخَذَ ٱلْقُرَىٰ وَهِىَ ظَـٰلِمَةٌ ۚ إِنَّ أَخْذَهُۥٓ أَلِيمٌ شَدِيدٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ أَخْذُ رَبِّكَ إِذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَخَذَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6492'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرَىٰ وَهِىَ ظَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِمَةٌ‌ۚ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ أَخْذَهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> أَلِي<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6493'>مٌ ش</tajweed>َد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa każālika akhżu rabbika iżā akhażal-qurā wa hiya ẓālimah(tun), inna akhżahū alīmun syadīd(un).
verses.translation: Такою хваткою Господь твой Казнил селения (людей), Которые неправедными были. И хватка эта, истинно, мучительна, сильна

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّمَنْ خَافَ عَذَابَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمٌ مَّجْمُوعٌ لَّهُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمٌ مَّشْهُودٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ فِى ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ لَأَيَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6494'>ةً ل</tajweed>ِّمَنْ خَافَ عَذَابَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6495'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخِرَةِ‌ۚ ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ يَوْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6496'>مٌ م</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6497'>جْ</tajweed>مُو<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6498'>عٌ ل</tajweed>َّهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6499'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسُ وَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ يَوْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6500'>مٌ م</tajweed>َّشْه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Inna fī żālika la'āyatal liman khāfa 'ażābal-ākhirah(ti), żālika yaumum majmū'(un), lahun-nāsu wa żālika yaumum masyhūd(un).
verses.translation: В этом - поистине, знамение для тех, Которые испытывают страх Пред наказанием другого мира. То будет День, В который будут собраны все люди, (То будет День Свидетельства), Которому свидетелями станут все

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا نُؤَخِّرُهُۥٓ إِلَّا لِأَجَلٍ مَّعْدُودٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا نُؤَخِّرُهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> إِلَّا لِأَجَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6501'>لٍ م</tajweed>َّعْد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā nu'akhkhiruhū illā li'ajalim ma'dūd(in).
verses.translation: И Мы дадим ему отсрочку Лишь на отчисленный предел

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يَأْتِ لَا تَكَلَّمُ نَفْسٌ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِۦ ۚ فَمِنْهُمْ شَقِىٌّ وَسَعِيدٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَ يَأْتِ لَا تَكَلَّمُ نَفْسٌ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed>‌ۚ فَمِنْهُمْ شَقِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6502'>ىٌّ و</tajweed>َسَع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yauma ya'ti lā takallamu nafsun illā bi'iżnih(ī), fa minhum syaqiyyuw wa sa'īd(un).
verses.translation: И вот когда наступит он, Не сможет ни одна душа Без разрешения Его глаголить. Из них - одни несчастны будут, Другие - счастливы (безмерно)

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ شَقُوا۟ فَفِى ٱلنَّارِ لَهُمْ فِيهَا زَفِيرٌ وَشَهِيقٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':136'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ شَقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فَفِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6503'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َارِ لَهُمْ فِيهَا زَفِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6504'>رٌ و</tajweed>َشَه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa ammal-lażīna syaqū fa fin-nāri lahum fīhā zafīruw wa syahīq(un).
verses.translation: В Огне быть тем, которые несчастны, Для них там - рев и вопль

verses.text_uthmani: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ رَبُّكَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: خَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6505'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تُ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2241'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضُ إِلَّا مَا ش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ رَبُّكَ‌ۚ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ رَبَّكَ فَعَّا<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6506'>لٌ ل</tajweed>ِّمَا يُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Khālidīna fīhā mā dāmatis-samāwātu wal-arḍu illā mā syā'a rabbuk(a), inna rabbaka fa''ālul limā yurīd(u).
verses.translation: И вечная обитель там, Пока земля и небо длятся, Если Господь твой только не захочет (Распорядиться ими) по-другому, - Ведь твой Господь, поистине, Вершитель всего, что пожелает Он

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ سُعِدُوا۟ فَفِى ٱلْجَنَّةِ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ رَبُّكَ ۖ عَطَآءً غَيْرَ مَجْذُوذٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':138'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ سُعِدُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فَفِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6507'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َةِ خَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6505'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تُ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2241'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضُ إِلَّا مَا ش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ رَبُّكَ‌ۖ عَط<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءً غَيْرَ مَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6508'>جْ</tajweed>ذ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>ذٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ammal-lażīna su'idū fa fil-jannati khālidīna fīhā mā dāmatis-samāwātu wal-arḍu illā mā syā'a rabbuk(a), 'aṭā'an gaira majżūż(in).
verses.translation: А те, что счастливы, - в Раю, И там - их вечная обитель, Пока земля и небо длятся, Если Господь твой только не захочет (Прибавить больше к благодати их), - Дар вечно длящейся услады

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَا تَكُ فِى مِرْيَةٍ مِّمَّا يَعْبُدُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ۚ مَا يَعْبُدُونَ إِلَّا كَمَا يَعْبُدُ ءَابَآؤُهُم مِّن قَبْلُ ۚ وَإِنَّا لَمُوَفُّوهُمْ نَصِيبَهُمْ غَيْرَ مَنقُوصٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَا تَكُ فِى مِرْيَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6509'>ةٍ م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا يَعْبُدُ هَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ؤُل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ‌ۚ مَا يَعْبُدُونَ إِلَّا كَمَا يَعْبُدُ ءَاب<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓؤُه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6510'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':128'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':129'>بْ</tajweed>لُ‌ۚ وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَمُوَفُّوهُمْ نَصِيبَهُمْ غَيْرَ مَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6511'>نق</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>صٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falā taku fī miryatim mimmā ya'budu hā'ulā'(i), mā ya'budūna  illā kamā ya'budu ābā'uhum min qabl(u),  wa innā lamuwaffūhum naṣībahum gaira manqūṣ(in).
verses.translation: Не предавайся же сомнениям о том, Что почитают эти люди, - Ведь почитают они так же, Как почитали прежде их отцы. И Мы, поистине, им воздадим их долю, Даже на йоту не убавив от нее

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ فَٱخْتُلِفَ فِيهِ ۚ وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَتْ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَفِى شَكٍّ مِّنْهُ مُرِيبٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':257'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بَ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6512'>ٱ</tajweed>خْتُلِفَ فِيهِ‌ۚ وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5989'>ةٌ س</tajweed>َبَقَتْ م<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':770'>ِن ر</tajweed>َّبِّكَ لَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُمْ‌ۚ وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ لَفِى شَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3275'>كٍّ م</tajweed>ِّنْهُ مُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>ٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad ātainā mūsal-kitāba fakhtulifa fīh(i), wa lau lā kalimatun sabaqat mir rabbika laquḍiya bainahum, wa innahum lafī syakkim minhu murīb(in).
verses.translation: Мы Мусе Книгу ниспослали, Но (среди них) о ней возникли споры, И, если б Слово твоего Владыки Не пришло к ним раньше, Меж ними было б все уж решено. Они же - в тягостных сомнениях об этом

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ كُلًّا لَّمَّا لَيُوَفِّيَنَّهُمْ رَبُّكَ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ كُل<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6513'>اًّ ل</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا لَيُوَفِّيَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ رَبُّكَ أَعْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَهُمْ‌ۚ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ خَب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa inna kullan lammā layuwaffiyannahum rabbuka a'mālahum, innahū bimā ya'malūna khabīr(un).
verses.translation: И несомненно, твой Господь Сполна воздаст им всем за их деянья, - Ведь сведущ Он о том, что делают они

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱسْتَقِمْ كَمَآ أُمِرْتَ وَمَن تَابَ مَعَكَ وَلَا تَطْغَوْا۟ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَقِمْ كَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُمِرْتَ وَمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6514'>ن ت</tajweed>َابَ مَعَكَ وَلَا تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6515'>طْ</tajweed>غَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ‌ۚ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَص<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fastaqim kamā umirta wa man tāba ma'aka wa lā taṭgau, innahū bimā ta'malūna baṣīr(un).
verses.translation: Так следуй же, (о Мухаммад!), прямой стезею, Как то повелено тебе и тем, Которые с тобою обратились. Не выходите за дозволенные грани, - Ведь видит Он, что делаете вы

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَا تَرْكَنُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ فَتَمَسَّكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِنْ أَوْلِيَآءَ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَا تَرْكَن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1372'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فَتَمَسَّكُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6516'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َارُ وَمَا لَك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':556'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':107'>ن د</tajweed>ُونِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':108'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ مِنْ أَوْلِي<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ لَا تُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6517'>نص</tajweed>َر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lā tarkanū ilal-lażīna ẓalamū fa tamassakumun-nār(u), wa mā lakum min dūnillāhi min auliyā'a ṡumma lā tunṣarūn(a).
verses.translation: И к тем, что беззаконны, не склоняйтесь, Чтоб огнь Ада не коснулся вас, - Вам нет защитников, кроме Аллаха, Ни от кого вам помощи не ждать

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ طَرَفَىِ ٱلنَّهَارِ وَزُلَفًا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلْحَسَنَـٰتِ يُذْهِبْنَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ذِكْرَىٰ لِلذَّٰكِرِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَقِمِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6518'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّلَ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٲ</tajweed>ةَ طَرَفَىِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6519'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهَارِ وَزُلَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6520'>فًا م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6029'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّيْلِ‌ۚ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6521'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَسَنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ يُذْهِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6522'>بْ</tajweed>نَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6523'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّيِّـَٔـاتِ‌ۚ ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ ذِكْرَىٰ لِلذّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>كِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa aqimiṣ-ṣalāta ṭarafayin-nahāri wa zulafam minal-lail(i), innal-ḥasanāti yużhibnas-sayyi'āt(i), żālika żikrā liż-żākirīn(a).
verses.translation: Творите регулярную молитву По двум пределам дня И (в ранние) часы (прихода и ухода) ночи, - Ведь, истинно, дела благие Приносят избавленье от дурных; Сие - напоминание для помнящих (о Боге)

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱصْبِرْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>صْبِرْ فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':513'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2418'>جْ</tajweed>رَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5898'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُحْسِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Waṣbir fa innallāha lā yaḍī'u ajral-muḥsinīn(a).
verses.translation: Будь терпеливо-стоек, - ведь Аллах Не даст пропасть награде добротворцев

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَوْلَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ أُو۟لُوا۟ بَقِيَّةٍ يَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلْفَسَادِ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا مِّمَّنْ أَنجَيْنَا مِنْهُمْ ۗ وَٱتَّبَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مَآ أُتْرِفُوا۟ فِيهِ وَكَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَوْلَا كَانَ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6524'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرُونِ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':85'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':86'>بْ</tajweed>لِكُمْ أُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بَقِيَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6525'>ةٍ ي</tajweed>َنْهَوْنَ عَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6526'>ٱ</tajweed>لْفَسَادِ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ إِلَّا قَلِيل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6527'>اً م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َنْ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5098'>نج</tajweed>َيْنَا مِنْهُمْ‌ۗ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3160'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّبَعَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6528'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُتْرِفُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فِيهِ وَكَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4958'>جْ</tajweed>رِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa lau lā kāna minal-qurūni min qablikum ulū baqiyyatiy yanhauna 'anil-fasādi fil-arḍi illā qalīlam mimman anjainā minhum, wattaba'al-lażīna ẓalamū mā utrifū fīhi wa kānū mujrimīn(a).
verses.translation: Но почему же не было из поколений прежде вас Таких, Кто, обладая добродетельной (душою), Мог на земле нечестие сдержать, Помимо лишь немногих, Кого спасли Мы милостью Своей? Но нечестивые пошли за удовольствиями этой жизни - И стали грешными (пред Нами)

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهْلِكَ ٱلْقُرَىٰ بِظُلْمٍ وَأَهْلُهَا مُصْلِحُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهْلِكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6529'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرَىٰ بِظُلْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4426'>مٍ و</tajweed>َأَهْلُهَا مُصْلِح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā kāna rabbuka liyuhlikal-qurā biẓulmiw wa ahluhā muṣliḥūn(a).
verses.translation: Господь твой не таков, Чтоб погубить несправедливо те селенья, Чьи жители благое совершали

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً ۖ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخْتَلِفِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَوْ ش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6530'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسَ أُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':1159'>ةً و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِدَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3089'>ةً‌ۖ و</tajweed>َلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخْتَلِف<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lau syā'a rabbuka laja'alan-nāsa ummataw wāḥidataw wa lā yazālūna mukhtalifīn(a).
verses.translation: И если б твой Господь желал, То Он бы сделал всех людей одним народом, - Они ж не прекращают разногласий

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ رَبُّكَ ۚ وَلِذَٰلِكَ خَلَقَهُمْ ۗ وَتَمَّتْ كَلِمَةُ رَبِّكَ لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا م<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6349'>َن ر</tajweed>َّحِمَ رَبُّكَ‌ۚ وَلِذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ خَلَقَهُمْ‌ۗ وَتَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َتْ كَلِمَةُ رَبِّكَ لَأَمْلَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ جَهَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6531'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َةِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':824'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسِ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':825'>جْ</tajweed>مَع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Illā mar raḥima rabbuk(a), wa liżālika khalaqahum, wa tammat kalimatu rabbika la'amla'anna jahannama minal-jinnati wan-nāsi ajma'īn(a).
verses.translation: Помимо тех, Кому явил Господь твой Свою милость, - Для этого Он создал их, И этим Слово Бога твоего свершится: "Я Ад людьми и джиннами наполню

verses.text_uthmani: وَكُلًّا نَّقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلرُّسُلِ مَا نُثَبِّتُ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَ ۚ وَجَآءَكَ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْحَقُّ وَمَوْعِظَةٌ وَذِكْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكُل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6532'>اًّ ن</tajweed>َّقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ أَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':1910'>نۢب</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6533'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رُّسُلِ مَا نُثَبِّتُ بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فُؤَادَكَ‌ۚ وَج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَكَ فِى هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذِهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6534'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَقُّ وَمَوْعِظَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6535'>ةٌ و</tajweed>َذِكْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa kullan naquṣṣu 'alaika min ambā'ir-rusuli mā nuṡabbitu bihī fu'ādaka wa jā'aka fī hāżihil-ḥaqqu wa mau'iẓatuw wa żikrā lil-mu'minīn(a).
verses.translation: Всем тем, что повествуем Мы тебе Из сказов о посланниках (Господних), Мы укрепляем твое сердце: И в этом Истина нисходит на тебя И наставление для верных, А также предостережение для них

verses.text_uthmani: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنَّا عَـٰمِلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6536'>ٱ</tajweed>عْمَلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا عَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qul lil-lażīna lā yu'minūna'malū 'alā makānatikum, innā 'āmilūn(a).
verses.translation: Тем, кто не верует, скажи: "Вы поступайте по своим возможностям (и предпочтеньям), Мы же - по нашим будем поступать

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱنتَظِرُوٓا۟ إِنَّا مُنتَظِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6537'>نت</tajweed>َظِر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا مُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4557'>نت</tajweed>َظِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wantaẓirū innā muntaẓirūn(a).
verses.translation: И ждите - с вами будем ждать и мы

verses.text_uthmani: وَلِلَّهِ غَيْبُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ يُرْجَعُ ٱلْأَمْرُ كُلُّهُۥ فَٱعْبُدْهُ وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَيْهِ ۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَـٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلِلَّهِ غَيْبُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6538'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':177'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ يُرْجَعُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6539'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَمْرُ كُلُّهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6540'>ٱ</tajweed>عْبُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6540'>دْ</tajweed>هُ وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَيْهِ‌ۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِلٍ عَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا تَعْمَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lillāhi gaibus-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa ilaihi yurja'ul-amru kulluhū fa'budhu wa tawakkal 'alaih(i), wa mā rabbuka bigāfilin 'ammā ta'malūn(a).
verses.translation: Илишь Аллах один Незримым неба и земли владеет, К Нему восходит повеление всего. Так поклоняйтесь же (Единому) Ему И на Него надежды возлагайте, - Ведь в небреженье ваш Господь не остается К тому, что делаете вы
